name: Thesis Labs
long_description: What if we could discover the next Transformer, invent the next AlphaFold, 10x faster? We are building systems that collaborate with humans to invent, train, and refine machine learning models. These agents operate in continuous, self-improving loops, guided by human creativity and intuition. Together, they accelerate the entire lifecycle of AI R&D, from idea to implementation.
one_liner: Thesis is an applied research lab accelerating human-in-the-loop AIâ€¦
